job.title: Junior Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Medalogix is a oneofakind data analytics company in the postacute care space We are transforming home health and hospice agencies by leveraging cuttingedge data science machine learning and innovative cloud technology to equip clinicians and agencies to provide the right care at the right timeltbrgtltbrgtThe Companys five machine learning products have demonstrated improved patient outcomes and reduced cost to the healthcare system including reduced hospitalization appropriate and timely transitions to endoflife care and optimized visit utilization for patients Medalogix is poised for tremendous growth as skilled home health and hospice care are positioned as the lowest cost providers in an industry shifting to valuebased careltbrgtltbrgtMedalogix is currently seeking a hungry humble and smart Junior Data Scientist to join our technology innovators that are bringing home health and hospice to the next levelltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy MedalogixltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtHigh growth ampamp awesome cultureltstronggt  Medalogix has grown 100 for three straight years with continued material growth planned over the next three years  This success is achieved through passionate highfunctioning talent focused on success  We work hard through our core virtues Be Badass Dream BigAct Small Do No Harm and Row TogetherltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtMeaningful work ltstronggt Our products are used by healthcare providers in their daytoday care programs  Our companys work directly impacts patient care in the home ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtModern technology productsltstronggt  At the core Medalogix is a technology company We build modern cloudbased SaaS software underpinned by data science and data engineering Our technology team is passionate about using leading tools and practices in our daily work We build marketleading products that delight our customers Medalogix products have received recognition from The Boston Globe Fierce Healthcare Beckers Hospital Review HIMSS and Harvard Business ReviewltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCompetitive compensation ampamp benefitsltstronggt  Medalogix provides big company benefits in a smaller company environment We provide competitive compensation along with awesome benefits including 401k matchingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRole OverviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtReporting to the VP of Data Science the Junior Data Scientist will assist in the development of our nextgeneration machine learning models This team member will also develop and expand the current model monitoring capabilities for the team and elevate our documentation practices A great candidate will bring passion and discipline for building scalable and explainable solutions focused on the customerltbrgtltbrgtA successful candidate will bring significant value and have a meaningful impact on our success The development of our new solutions will generate material and incremental revenue for the company They will transform the companys ability to solve meaningful health care problems through innovative and cuttingedge data science developmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDevelop interactive or static data visualizationsdashboards using BI tools such as Tableau PowerBI or SiSense to track model performanceltligtltligtDevelop and maintain uptodate documentation for analyses and models developed by the Data Science teamltligtltligtGenerate and manage monitoring tools to measure model efficacy and model driftltligtltligtSupport the development of predictive models and other analytics solutionsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWhat would make you a strong fit for this
